item.title: Kingdom Hearts III To Focus on Disney Worlds, No New Final Fantasy Worlds
item.description:
Kingdom Hearts III To Focus on Disney Worlds, No New Final Fantasy Worlds

In a recent interview with Gamespot, Kingdom Hearts III co-directer Tai Yasue touched on the topic of what worlds we can expect to see in the much-anticipated installation in the action RPG series. Yasue began with saying "we're not adding any Final Fantasy worlds.

item.title: NVIDIA May be Preparing to Launch New Titan "Soon"
item.description:
NVIDIA May be Preparing to Launch New Titan "Soon"

Graphics specialist NVIDIA introduced its very first ultra-high-end gaming graphics card under the branding of "Titan" back in early 2013. The part was introduced at an eye-popping $999 price point, but reports at the time suggested that the card actually sold well -- at the very least, better than the company expected.

item.title: BREAKING: The CW's 'Supergirl' has found their Man of Steel
item.description:
BREAKING: The CW's 'Supergirl' has found their Man of Steel

Metropolis has its champion! We reported earlier this month that Superman would be making an appearance next season on The CW's Supergirl. Today we learned who would be filling the Man of Steel's famous red boots. While many fans were clamoring for Tom Welling to once again don the cape, it was not meant to be.

item.title: Spider-Man's Gorgeous PS4 Demo @ E3 Was All In-Engine Gameplay
item.description:
Spider-Man's Gorgeous PS4 Demo @ E3 Was All In-Engine Gameplay

Spider-Man's reveal trailer was actually in-engine gameplay, not a pre-rendered cutscene, Insomniac Games has confirmed. The impressive demo led to some Twitter users doubting whether the developer would actually be able to achieve that level of fidelity in-game, to which Insomniac assured " it's gameplay!"

item.title: Capcom's Resident Evil VII in VR Hits All The Horror High Notes..
item.description:
Capcom's Resident Evil VII in VR Hits All The Horror High Notes..

It's just a game. This is what I told myself, repeatedly, as I experienced the Resident Evil series in virtual reality for the first time. It was just a game, it couldn't hurt me. I wasn't really in a creepy, decrepit old farmhouse-just in a press demo room that happened to be modeled after the rooms in said creepy house.

item.title: Microsoft: Xbox Scorpio Offers Nothing For Standard Gamers, Don't Buy It If you Don't Own a 4K Display
item.description:
Microsoft: Xbox Scorpio Offers Nothing For Standard Gamers, Don't Buy It If you Don't Own a 4K Display

We know that the Xbox Scorpio exists, we know that it's much more powerful than the Xbox One, but we don't know a whole lot else. Microsoft's decision to announce this far in advance was a bit surprising to some, but it's always nice to see cracks in that wall of silence that too often defines the video game industry.

item.title: VRSE rebrands to 'Within' in attempt to become the HBO of VR Content
item.description:
VRSE rebrands to 'Within' in attempt to become the HBO of VR Content

Vrse, the company that collaborated with several media outlets, including the New York Times and Vice, to bring virtual-reality stories, is rebranding to Within. If you didn't know, Vrse was supposed to be pronounced as "verse," according to Chief Operating Officer Drew Larner, who was previously the CEO of Rdio.

item.title: Coding Can Be Easy, But No One Wants To - Apple's 'Swift Playgrounds' Aims to Make You Want to Code
item.description:
Coding Can Be Easy, But No One Wants To - Apple's 'Swift Playgrounds' Aims to Make You Want to Code

There were tears during Apple's developer conference this year. Not so much that members of the audience risked dehydration, but people were definitely wiping the corners of their eyes. You don't see crying at tech events much, thank goodness, but I was happy to see it here.

item.title: Sony: Every Demo of PlayStation VR has been conducted on an everyday PS4..
item.description:
Sony: Every Demo of PlayStation VR has been conducted on an everyday PS4..

When PlayStation VR launches on October 13 in North America and Europe for $399, Sony is expecting there to be supply constraints. After the excitement and buzz from their presser at E3, sony felt it important to clarify that EVERY demo of PlayStation VR has been conducted on an everyday PS4.

item.title: Sony: All Games E3 PS4 Games Ran on a Standard PS4, God of War Played Live
item.description:
Sony: All Games E3 PS4 Games Ran on a Standard PS4, God of War Played Live

As for the lengthy God of War demo played during Sony's press conference, Technical Director Mihir Sheth confirmed that it was played live. "The demo that you saw was running on a regular PS4 ... and it was a live demo played at the press conference, contrary to what people are saying," he told the Daily Star.
